summary: This bill, H.R. 5641, proposes to designate the United States Postal Service facility located at 240 Main Street in Northport, New York, as the "Coast Guard Petty Officer 3rd Class Nate Bruckenthal Post Office Building." The bill specifies the new name and states that any existing references to the facility should be updated accordingly. The bill was introduced in the House of Representatives on September 30, 2025.
